Requirements You are in @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feats-srd.Monastic Archer Stance]{Monastic Archer Stance}.

You achieve a state of perfect calm before unleashing your attack, opening your mind to the minute movements of the world around you to increase your accuracy.

Make a ranged weapon Strike against a target within your weapon's first range increment. This Strike ignores the target's @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Concealed]{Concealed} condition and all cover.
